name: Hiding Star
description:
Single player game with puzzle elements and survival in a mysterious building, where you are chased by a mad attraction - Toothy Jack, who serves Hostess. Use Toy Gun to solve puzzles and move forward



Using the ToyGun is not so easy, you need to calculate the distance to the target and the speed of the projectile.


Take cover, move cautiously along the narrow path, trying not to fall into the abyss, visiting strange rooms and memory-lost creatures.



Don’t let Toothy Jack see you!



The old amusement test room is full of secrets and dangers.


"Toothy Jack will bring you back. To the Hostess, to the Hostess... "
